value.excerpt: A new video shared by AI expert Santiago Valdarrama, showcases Boston Dynamics' robot dog, Spot, performing a few new tricks that involve artificial intelligence. value.title: Jellyfish Robots Could One Day Clean Up The World’s Oceans
value.excerpt: Marine plastic pollution is a bigger problem than some may realize.
